Question
========

If you simultaneously flip four coins, what is the probability that two coins will have cross above?

Answerlist
----------

* $\frac{1}{2}$
* $\frac{1}{3}$
* $\frac{1}{4}$
* $\frac{3}{8}$

Solution
========

Answerlist
----------

* $\frac{1}{2}$: Incorrect
* $\frac{1}{3}$: Incorrect
* $\frac{1}{4}$: Incorrect
* $\frac{3}{8}$: Correct
